post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
1. Have fun. Enjoy the ride Humor can help difficult conversation.
2. Have the clear idea of what you like to get ? There is always price. How much do you like to pay or how much do you like to get ?
3. Start with small issue that you and your negotiating partner can agree on. All or nothing method could be very dangerous.
4. Patient and Persistent Do not give up. Your negotiating partner is waiting for you to break.
5. Ask questions and be active listener. Summarize what you heard and paraphrase it for clarify your understanding
6. Speculate and look for alternatives Use phrase like suppose, what if I do something and etc.
7. Piggy-back your negotiating partner's story Sound good and can I add xxx to your story or idea
8. Face Saving is very important Do not humiliate your negotiating partner. If you have something to say or like to criticize, do it privately not in public place specially during the meeting or public function
9. Differentiate you from rest of them What are additional values you can bring on the table ?
10. Sit back and relax Life is learning experience. Your negotiating partner could teach you one or two things you do not realize yet.
post.title: Negotiation / Difficult Conversation : 10 Tips
